p:
Microplate Alamar blue assay (MABA)
32 has been utilised to determine MICs for all herein prepared hybrids ( 5a–m, 9a–c, and 14) against M. tuberculosis ATCC 27294 (Isoniazid-susceptible strain) and Mycobacterium tuberculosis ATCC 35823 (Isoniazid and Streptomycin resistant strain). The detailed procedures were presented in the supporting materials.
